name: @fowles/tokens
description: Chopped and extended Figmagic coupled with Amazon Style Dictionary.
author: Mikael Vesavuori, AWS Team, Scott Fowles

scripts.tokens: echo Building JSON tokens... && echo Building JS and TS tokens... && rm -rf _raw.json && rm -rf img && rm -rf css && rm -rf json && rm -rf js && rm -rf _scss && node --experimental-modules --no-warnings main.mjs && echo Initiating Style Dictionary... && node ./build.js && echo && echo Design Tokens generated successfully! && echo
scripts.precommit: echo Running pre-commit linting... && pretty-quick --staged && npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && git add package.json
